metadata.title: CVE-2021-34193 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Stack overflow vulnerability in OpenSC smart card middleware before 0.23via crafted responses to APDUs.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-34193` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

opensc - 0.22.0-1
opensc-pkcs11 - 0.22.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opensc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.22.0-1').
